meanings.definition: Have a desire to possess or do something.
meanings.sent2: She wants a new toy for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The cat wants to chase the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: His eyes wanted to close after a long day.
meanings.sent5: The students want to learn new things every day.

meanings.definition: Lack or be short of something desirable or essential.
meanings.sent1: We want more time to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The store wants fresh fruits for the customers.
meanings.sent3: The phone wants to be charged before the trip.
meanings.sent4: The garden wants rain to grow beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The car wants gas to start the engine.
